scripts.setup: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/ public/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/angular/ public/angular/ && cp -r node_modules/angular-ui-router/release/ public/angular-ui-router/ && cp -r node_modules/jquery/dist/ public/jquery/
scripts.setupDos: XCOPY node_modules\bootstrap\dist\ public ootstrap\ \S && XCOPY node_modules\angular\ public\angular\  \S && XCOPY node_modules\angular-ui-router\release\ public\angular-ui-router\  \S && XCOPY node_modules\jquery\dist\ public\jquery\  \S
scripts.clean: rm -r node_modules && rm -r public/bootstrap && rm -r public/angular && rm -r public/angular-ui-router && rm -r public/jquery
